cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 16th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Budget-friendly shared room at Bayside House with 4 beds, shared bathroom, powerpoints, lockers, and fresh linen. Amenities include phone charging stations, TV, pool table, kitchen, and chill-out zones with heating/cooling. Perfect for solo travellers.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.name: Basic 6 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Budget-friendly Female only room at Bayside House with 6 beds, shared bathroom, powerpoints, lockers and fresh linen. Amenities include charging stations, TV, pool table, kitchen, and chill-out zones with heating/cooling. Perfect for female travellers.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Deluxe Queen Room with shared bathroom, powerpoints, fresh linen, TV, A/C, perfect for couples/solo travellers. Complimentary phone charging, entertainment, kitchen, heating/cooling, chill-out zones. Additional towels available to purchase.
